hints.content:
Every bill has a different value.

Dollar name | Picture | Value
- | - | -
One dollar bill | ![Front and back photo of one dollar bill.](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/526e9b19f2c39d0d908b6c531d510186f6e93e97.png) | $\$1$
Five dollar bill | ![Front and back photo of five dollar bill.](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/5069901d0226c2c5f1c3e73b2b5d7e48ee1e1eee.png) | $\$5$
Ten dollar bill | ![Front and back photo of ten dollar bill.](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/35b0286a92e1825d39af39b5e362e5d9674eb00d.png) | $\$10$
Twenty dollar bill | ![Front and back photo of twenty dollar bill.](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/66f0febd8ba41a0e3413f72b2f1fc2d54a3819de.png) | $\$20$

Let's label the value of each set of bills and find the total.

![1, twenty dollar bill. 1, five dollar  bill. 4, one dollar bills.](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/42c8401cc4a2afa89a4bca83f870b62beb79eee6.png)

$\begin{align}
&\underbrace{ \$\maroonD{20}}_{\maroonD{1}{\text{ twenty dollar bill}}}   + \underbrace{\$\purpleD{5}}_{\purpleD{1}{\text{ five dollar bill}}} +\underbrace{\$\blueE{1} + \$\blueE{1} +\$\blueE{1} + \$\blueE{1}}_{\blueE{4}{\text{ one dollar bills}}}\\\\
&\underbrace{\$\maroonD{20}}_{\maroonD{1}{\text{ twenty dollar bill}}} 
 + \underbrace{\$\purpleD{5}}_{\purpleD{1}{\text{ five dollar bill}}}   +\underbrace{\$\blueE{4}}_{\blueE{4}{\text{ one dollar bills}}}=\$29
\end{align}$

This set of bills has a value of $\$29$, so it **is** equal to Kareem's amount of money.

Kareem could have this set of bills:

![1, twenty dollar bill. 1, five dollar  bill. 4, one dollar bills.](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/42c8401cc4a2afa89a4bca83f870b62beb79eee6.png)

question.content:
Kareem has $\$29$.

**Which set of bills could Kareem have?**

[[â˜ƒ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![1, twenty dollar bill. 1, five dollar  bill. 4, one dollar bills.](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/42c8401cc4a2afa89a4bca83f870b62beb79eee6.png)
![2, ten dollar bills. 1, five dollar bill. 3, one dollar bills.](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/4eb2752b7d969eb1c04022bd77339f0047021006.png)
![1, ten dollar bill. 1, five dollar bill. 4, one dollar bills.](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/0354c9ba52dc61658ccf6709af31a30be1394b0b.png)
